recipe.title: Garlic Mojo Sauce
ingredients: 8 garlic cloves, pressed or finely chopped
1/2 cup fresh lime juice (from about 4 limes)
1/2 cup fresh orange juice (from about 1 orange)
instructions: Heat oil in a small saucepan over medium. Stir in garlic, cumin, and oregano, then immediately remove from heat. Let cool 10–15 minutes. Stir in chile, lime juice, orange juice, and salt.
Do Ahead Sauce can be made 1 week ahead. Transfer to an airtight container and chill.
